   19: 
   20: -module(erl_scan_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   22: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([error_1/1, error_2/1, iso88591/1, otp_7810/1, otp_10302/1,
   26: 	 otp_10990/1, otp_10992/1, otp_11807/1, otp_16480/1, otp_17024/1,
   27:          text_fun/1, triple_quoted_string/1]).
   28: 
   29: -import(lists, [nth/2,flatten/1]).
   30: -import(io_lib, [print/1]).
   31: 
   32: %%
   33: %% Define to run outside of test server
   34: %%
   35: %%-define(STANDALONE,1).
   36: 
   37: -ifdef(STANDALONE).
   38: -compile(export_all).
   39: -define(line, put(line, ?LINE), ).
   40: -define(config(A,B),config(A,B)).
   41: -define(t, test_server).
   42: %% config(priv_dir, _) ->
   43: %%     ".";
   44: %% config(data_dir, _) ->
   45: %%     ".".
   46: -else.
   47: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   48: -endif.
   49: 
   50: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: suite() ->
   57:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   58:      {timetrap,{minutes,20}}].
   59: 
   60: all() ->
   61:     [{group, error}, iso88591, otp_7810, otp_10302, otp_10990, otp_10992,
   62:      otp_11807, otp_16480, otp_17024, text_fun, triple_quoted_string].
   63: 
   64: groups() ->
   65:     [{error, [], [error_1, error_2]}].
   66: 
   67: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   68:     Config.
   69: 
   70: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   74:     Config.
   75: 
   76: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   77:     Config.
   78: 
   79: 
   80: 
   81: %% (OTP-2347)
   82: error_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   83:     {error, _, _} = erl_scan:string("'a"),
   84:     ok.
   85: 
   86: %% Checks that format_error works on the error cases.
   87: error_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   88:     lists:foreach(fun check/1, error_cases()),
   89:     ok.
   90: 
   91: error_cases() ->
   92:     ["'a",
   93:      "\"a",%"
   94:      "'\\",
   95:      "\"\\",%"
   96:      "$",
   97:      "$\\",
   98:      "2.3e",
   99:      "2.3e-",
  100:      "91#9",
  101:      "\"\"\"x",%"
  102:      "\"\"\"\n\"\"",%"
  103:      "\"\"\"\nx\n \"\"\""
  104:     ].
  105: 
  106: assert_type(N, integer) when is_integer(N) ->
  107:     ok;
  108: assert_type(N, atom) when is_atom(N) ->
  109:     ok.
  110: 
  111: check(String) ->
  112:     Error = erl_scan:string(String),
  113:     check_error(Error, erl_scan).
  114: 
  115: %%% (This should be useful for all format_error functions.)
  116: check_error({error, Info, EndLine}, Module0) ->
  117:     {ErrorLine, Module, Desc} = Info,
  118:     true = (Module == Module0),
  119:     assert_type(EndLine, integer),
  120:     assert_type(ErrorLine, integer),
  121:     true = (ErrorLine =< EndLine),
  122:     String = lists:flatten(Module0:format_error(Desc)),
  123:     true = io_lib:printable_list(String).
  124: 
  125: %% Tests the support for ISO-8859-1 i.e Latin-1.
  126: iso88591(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  127:     ok =
  128: 	case catch begin
  129: 		       %% Some atom and variable names
  130: 		       V1s = [$Á,$á,$é,$ë],
  131: 		       V2s = [$N,$ä,$r],
  132: 		       A1s = [$h,$ä,$r],
  133: 		       A2s = [$ö,$r,$e],
  134: 		       %% Test parsing atom and variable characters.
  135: 		       {ok,Ts1,_} = erl_scan_string(V1s ++ " " ++ V2s ++
  136: 							"\327" ++
  137: 							A1s ++ " " ++ A2s),
  138: 		       V1s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(1, Ts1))),
  139: 		       V2s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(2, Ts1))),
  140: 		       A1s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(4, Ts1))),
  141: 		       A2s = atom_to_list(element(3, nth(5, Ts1))),
  142: 		       %% Test printing atoms
  143: 		       A1s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(4, Ts1)))),
  144: 		       A2s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(5, Ts1)))),
  145: 		       %% Test parsing and printing strings.
  146: 		       S1 = V1s ++ "\327" ++ A1s ++ "\250" ++ A2s,
  147: 		       S1s = "\"" ++ S1 ++ "\"",
  148: 		       {ok,Ts2,_} = erl_scan_string(S1s),
  149: 		       S1 = element(3, nth(1, Ts2)),
  150: 		       S1s = flatten(print(element(3, nth(1, Ts2)))),
  151: 		       ok				%It all worked
  152: 		   end of
  153: 	    {'EXIT',R} ->				%Something went wrong!
  154: 		{error,R};
  155: 	    ok -> ok				%Aok
  156: 	end.
  157: 
  158: %% OTP-7810. White spaces, comments, and more...
  159: otp_7810(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  160:     ok = reserved_words(),
  161:     ok = atoms(),
  162:     ok = punctuations(),
  163:     ok = comments(),
  164:     ok = errors(),
  165:     ok = integers(),
  166:     ok = base_integers(),
  167:     ok = floats(),
  168:     ok = dots(),
  169:     ok = chars(),
  170:     ok = variables(),
  171:     ok = eof(),
  172:     ok = illegal(),
  173:     ok = crashes(),
  174: 
  175:     ok = options(),
  176:     ok = token_info(),
  177:     ok = column_errors(),
  178:     ok = white_spaces(),
  179: 
  180:     ok = unicode(),
  181: 
  182:     ok = more_chars(),
  183:     ok = more_options(),
  184:     ok = anno_info(),
  185: 
  186:     ok.
  187: 
  188: reserved_words() ->
  189:     L = ['after', 'begin', 'case', 'try', 'cond', 'catch',
  190:          'andalso', 'orelse', 'end', 'fun', 'if', 'let', 'of',
  191:          'receive', 'when', 'bnot', 'not', 'div',
  192:          'rem', 'band', 'and', 'bor', 'bxor', 'bsl', 'bsr',
  193:          'or', 'xor'],
  194:     [begin
  195:          {RW, true} = {RW, erl_scan:reserved_word(RW)},
  196:          S = atom_to_list(RW),
  197:          Ts = [{RW,{1,1}}],
  198:          test_string(S, Ts)
  199:      end || RW <- L],
  200:     ok.
  201: 
  202: 
  203: atoms() ->
  204:     test_string("a
  205:                  b", [{atom,{1,1},a},{atom,{2,18},b}]),
  206:     test_string("'a b'", [{atom,{1,1},'a b'}]),
  207: 		test_string("a", [{atom,{1,1},a}]),
  208: 		test_string("a@2", [{atom,{1,1},a@2}]),
  209: 		test_string([39,65,200,39], [{atom,{1,1},'AÈ'}]),
  210: 		test_string("ärlig östen", [{atom,{1,1},ärlig},{atom,{1,7},östen}]),
  211: 		{ok,[{atom,_,'$a'}],{1,6}} =
  212: 		    erl_scan_string("'$\\a'", {1,1}),
  213: 		test("'$\\a'"),
  214: 		ok.
  215: 
  216: punctuations() ->
  217:     L = ["<<", "<-", "<=", "<", ">>", ">=", ">", "->", "--",
  218:          "-", "++", "+", "=:=", "=/=", "=<", "=>", "==", "=", "/=",
  219:          "/", "||", "|", ":=", "::", ":"],
  220:     %% One token at a time:
  221:     [begin
  222:          W = list_to_atom(S),
  223:          Ts = [{W,{1,1}}],
  224:          test_string(S, Ts)
  225:      end || S <- L],
  226:     Three = ["/=:=", "<:=", "==:=", ">=:="], % three tokens...
  227:     No = Three ++ L,
  228:     SL0 = [{S1++S2,{-length(S1),S1,S2}} ||
  229:               S1 <- L,
  230:               S2 <- L,
  231:               not lists:member(S1++S2, No)],
  232:     SL = family_list(SL0),
  233:     %% Two tokens. When there are several answers, the one with
  234:     %% the longest first token is chosen:
  235:     %% [the special case "=<<" is among the tested ones]
  236:     [begin
  237:          W1 = list_to_atom(S1),
  238:          W2 = list_to_atom(S2),
  239:          Ts = [{W1,{1,1}},{W2,{1,-L2+1}}],
  240:          test_string(S, Ts)
  241:      end || {S,[{L2,S1,S2}|_]}  <- SL],
  242: 
  243:     PTs1 = [{'!',{1,1}},{'(',{1,2}},{')',{1,3}},{',',{1,4}},{';',{1,5}},
  244:             {'=',{1,6}},{'[',{1,7}},{']',{1,8}},{'{',{1,9}},{'|',{1,10}},
  245:             {'}',{1,11}}],
  246:     test_string("!(),;=[]{|}", PTs1),
  247: 
  248:     PTs2 = [{'#',{1,1}},{'&',{1,2}},{'*',{1,3}},{'+',{1,4}},{'/',{1,5}},
  249:             {':',{1,6}},{'<',{1,7}},{'>',{1,8}},{'?',{1,9}},{'@',{1,10}},
  250:             {'\\',{1,11}},{'^',{1,12}},{'`',{1,13}}],
  251:     test_string("#&*+/:<>?@\\^`", PTs2),
  252: 
  253:     test_string(".. ", [{'..',{1,1}}]),
  254:     test_string("1 .. 2",
  255:                 [{integer,{1,1},1},{'..',{1,3}},{integer,{1,6},2}]),
  256:     test_string("...", [{'...',{1,1}}]),
  257:     ok.
  258: 
  259: comments() ->
  260:     test("a %%\n b"),
  261:     {ok,[],1} = erl_scan_string("%"),
  262:     test("a %%\n b"),
  263:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{atom,{2,2},b}],{2,3}} =
  264:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b", {1,1}),
  265:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{comment,{1,3},"%%"},{atom,{2,2},b}],{2,3}} =
  266:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1}, [return_comments]),
  267:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},
  268:          {white_space,{1,2}," "},
  269:          {white_space,{1,5},"\n "},
  270:          {atom,{2,2},b}],
  271:      {2,3}} =
  272:         erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1},[return_white_spaces]),
  273:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},
  274:          {white_space,{1,2}," "},
  275:          {comment,{1,3},"%%"},
  276:          {white_space,{1,5},"\n "},
  277:          {atom,{2,2},b}],
  278:      {2,3}} = erl_scan_string("a %%\n b",{1,1},[return]),
  279:     ok.
  280: 
  281: errors() ->
  282:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{unterminated,atom,"qa"}},1} = erl_scan:string("'qa"), %'
  283:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,atom,"qa"}},{1,4}} = %'
  284:         erl_scan:string("'qa", {1,1}, []), %'
  285:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{unterminated,string,"str"}},1} = %"
  286:         erl_scan:string("\"str"), %"
  287:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,string,"str"}},{1,5}} = %"
  288:         erl_scan:string("\"str", {1,1}, []), %"
  289:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},1} = erl_scan:string("$"),
  290:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,2}} =
  291:         erl_scan:string("$", {1,1}, []),
  292:     test_string([34,65,200,34], [{string,{1,1},"AÈ"}]),
  293:     test_string("\\", [{'\\',{1,1}}]),
  294:     {'EXIT',_} =
  295:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:string('$\\a', {1,1})}), % type error
  296:     {'EXIT',_} =
  297:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:tokens([], '$\\a', {1,1})}), % type error
  298: 
  299:     "{a,tuple}" = erl_scan:format_error({a,tuple}),
  300:     ok.
  301: 
  302: integers() ->
  303:     [begin
  304:          I = list_to_integer(S),
  305:          Ts = [{integer,{1,1},I}],
  306:          test_string(S, Ts)
  307:      end || S <- [[N] || N <- lists:seq($0, $9)] ++ ["2323","000"] ],
  308:     UnderscoreSamples =
  309:         [{"123_456", 123456},
  310:          {"123_456_789", 123456789},
  311:          {"1_2", 12}],
  312:     lists:foreach(
  313:          fun({S, I}) ->
  314:                  test_string(S, [{integer, {1, 1}, I}])
  315:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  316:     NotIntegers =
  317:         ["_123",
  318:          "__123"],
  319:     lists:foreach(
  320:       fun(S) ->
  321:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  322:                   {ok, [{integer, _, _}|_], _} ->
  323:                       error({unexpected_integer, S});
  324:                   {ok, _, _} ->
  325:                       ok
  326:               end
  327:       end, NotIntegers),
  328:     IntegerErrors =
  329:         ["123_",
  330:          "123__",
  331:          "123_456_",
  332:          "123__456",
  333:          "123_.456",
  334:          "123abc",
  335:          "12@"],
  336:     lists:foreach(
  337:       fun(S) ->
  338:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  339:                   {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,integer}},_} ->
  340:                       ok;
  341:                   {error,Err} ->
  342:                       error({unexpected_error, S, Err});
  343:                   Succ ->
  344:                       error({unexpected_success, S, Succ})
  345:               end
  346:       end, IntegerErrors),
  347:     ok.
  348: 
  349: base_integers() ->
  350:     [begin
  351:          B = list_to_integer(BS),
  352:          I = erlang:list_to_integer(S, B),
  353:          Ts = [{integer,{1,1},I}],
  354:          test_string(BS++"#"++S, Ts)
  355:      end || {BS,S} <- [{"2","11"}, {"5","23234"}, {"12","05a"},
  356:                        {"16","abcdef"}, {"16","ABCDEF"}] ],
  357: 
  358:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{base,1}},1} = erl_scan:string("1#000"),
  359:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{base,1}},{1,2}} =
  360:         erl_scan:string("1#000", {1,1}, []),
  361: 
  362:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{base,1}},1} = erl_scan:string("1#000"),
  363:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{base,1000}},{1,6}} =
  364:         erl_scan:string("1_000#000", {1,1}, []),
  365: 
  366:     [begin
  367:          Str = BS ++ "#" ++ S,
  368:          E = 2 + length(BS),
  369:          {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,integer}},{1,E}} =
  370:              erl_scan:string(Str, {1,1}, [])
  371:      end || {BS,S} <- [{"3","3"},{"15","f"},{"12","c"},
  372:                        {"1_5","f"},{"1_2","c"}] ],
  373: 
  374:     UnderscoreSamples =
  375:         [{"16#1234_ABCD_EF56", 16#1234abcdef56},
  376:          {"2#0011_0101_0011", 2#001101010011},
  377:          {"1_6#123ABC", 16#123abc},
  378:          {"1_6#123_ABC", 16#123abc},
  379:          {"16#abcdef", 16#ABCDEF}],
  380:     lists:foreach(
  381:          fun({S, I}) ->
  382:                  test_string(S, [{integer, {1, 1}, I}])
  383:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  384:     IntegerErrors =
  385:         ["16_#123ABC",
  386:          "16#123_",
  387:          "16#_123",
  388:          "16#ABC_",
  389:          "16#_ABC",
  390:          "2#_0101",
  391:          "1__6#ABC",
  392:          "16#AB__CD",
  393:          "16#eg",
  394:          "16#ef@",
  395:          "10_#",
  396:          "10#12a4",
  397:          "10#12A4"],
  398:     lists:foreach(
  399:       fun(S) ->
  400:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  401:                   {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,integer}},_} ->
  402:                       ok;
  403:                   {error,Err} ->
  404:                       error({unexpected_error, S, Err});
  405:                   Succ ->
  406:                       error({unexpected_success, S, Succ})
  407:               end
  408:       end, IntegerErrors),
  409:     test_string("_16#ABC", [{var,{1,1},'_16'},{'#',{1,4}},{var,{1,5},'ABC'}]),
  410:     ok.
  411: 
  412: floats() ->
  413:     [begin
  414:          F = list_to_float(FS),
  415:          Ts = [{float,{1,1},F}],
  416:          test_string(FS, Ts)
  417:      end || FS <- ["1.0","001.17","3.31200","1.0e0","1.0E17",
  418:                    "34.21E-18", "17.0E+14"]],
  419: 
  420:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} =
  421:         erl_scan:string("1.0e400"),
  422:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,8}} =
  423:         erl_scan:string("1.0e400", {1,1}, []),
  424:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,9}} =
  425:         erl_scan:string("1.0e4_00", {1,1}, []),
  426:     [begin
  427:          {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} = erl_scan:string(S),
  428:          {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,_}} =
  429:              erl_scan:string(S, {1,1}, [])
  430:      end || S <- ["1.14Ea"]],
  431: 
  432:     UnderscoreSamples =
  433:         [{"123_456.789", 123456.789},
  434:          {"123.456_789", 123.456789},
  435:          {"1.2_345e10", 1.2345e10},
  436:          {"1.234e1_06", 1.234e106},
  437:          {"12_34.56_78e1_6", 1234.5678e16},
  438:          {"12_34.56_78e-1_8", 1234.5678e-18}],
  439:     lists:foreach(
  440:          fun({S, I}) ->
  441:                  test_string(S, [{float, {1, 1}, I}])
  442:          end, UnderscoreSamples),
  443:     FloatErrors =
  444:         ["123.456_",
  445:          "1.23_e10",
  446:          "1.23e_10",
  447:          "1.23e10_",
  448:          "123.45_e6",
  449:          "123.45a12",
  450:          "123.45e23a12",
  451:          "1.e2",
  452:          "12._34",
  453:          "123.a4"
  454:         ],
  455:     lists:foreach(
  456:       fun(S) ->
  457:               case erl_scan:string(S) of
  458:                   {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},_} ->
  459:                       ok;
  460:                   {error,Err} ->
  461:                       error({unexpected_error, S, Err});
  462:                   Succ ->
  463:                       error({unexpected_success, S, Succ})
  464:               end
  465:       end, FloatErrors),
  466:     ok.
  467: 
  468: dots() ->
  469:     Dot = [{".",    {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,2}}},
  470:            {". ",   {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  471:            {".\n",  {ok,[{dot,1}],2}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{2,1}}},
  472:            {".%",   {ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  473:            {".\210",{ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,3}}},
  474:            {".% öh",{ok,[{dot,1}],1}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{1,6}}},
  475:            {".%\n", {ok,[{dot,1}],2}, {ok,[{dot,{1,1}}],{2,1}}},
  476:            {".$",   {error,{1,erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},1},
  477: 	    {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,3}}},
  478:            {".$\\", {error,{1,erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},1},
  479:                     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,4}}},
  480:            {".a",   {ok,[{'.',1},{atom,1,a}],1},
  481: 	    {ok,[{'.',{1,1}},{atom,{1,2},a}],{1,3}}}
  482:           ],
  483:     [begin
  484:          R = erl_scan_string(S),
  485:          R2 = erl_scan_string(S, {1,1}, [])
  486:      end || {S, R, R2} <- Dot],
  487: 
  488:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T1],{1,2}} = erl_scan:string(".", {1,1}, text),
  489:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T1),
  490:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T2],{1,3}} = erl_scan:string(".%", {1,1}, text),
  491:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T2),
  492:     {ok,[{dot,_}=T3],{1,6}} =
  493:         erl_scan:string(".% öh", {1,1}, text),
  494:     [1, 1, "."] = token_info(T3),
  495:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,3}} =
  496:         erl_scan:string(".$", {1,1}),
  497:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,4}} =
  498:         erl_scan:string(".$\\", {1,1}),
  499: 
  500:     test_string(". ", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  501:     test_string(".  ", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  502:     test_string(".\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  503:     test_string(".\n\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  504:     test_string(".\n\r", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  505:     test_string(".\n\n\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  506:     test_string(".\210", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  507:     test_string(".%\n", [{dot,{1,1}}]),
  508:     test_string(".a", [{'.',{1,1}},{atom,{1,2},a}]),
  509: 
  510:     test_string("%. \n. ", [{dot,{2,1}}]),
  511:     {more,C} = erl_scan:tokens([], "%. ",{1,1}, return),
  512:     {done,{ok,[{comment,{1,1},"%. "},
  513:                {white_space,{1,4},"\n"},
  514:                {dot,{2,1}}],
  515:            {2,3}}, ""} =
  516:         erl_scan_tokens(C, "\n. ", {1,1}, return), % any loc, any options
  517: 
  518:     [test_string(S, R) ||
  519:         {S, R} <- [{".$\n",   [{'.',{1,1}},{char,{1,2},$\n}]},
  520:                    {"$\\\n",  [{char,{1,1},$\n}]},
  521:                    {"'\\\n'", [{atom,{1,1},'\n'}]},
  522:                    {"$\n",    [{char,{1,1},$\n}]}] ],
  523:     ok.
  524: 
  525: chars() ->
  526:     [begin
  527:          L = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("$\\~.8b", [C])),
  528:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  529:          test_string(L, Ts)
  530:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255)],
  531: 
  532:     %% Leading zeroes...
  533:     [begin
  534:          L = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("$\\~3.8.0b", [C])),
  535:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  536:          test_string(L, Ts)
  537:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255)],
  538: 
  539:     %% GH-6477. Test legal use of caret notation.
  540:     [begin
  541:          L = "$\\^" ++ [C],
  542:          Ts = case C of
  543:                   $? ->
  544:                       [{char,{1,1},127}];
  545:                   _ ->
  546:                       [{char,{1,1},C band 2#11111}]
  547:               end,
  548:          test_string(L, Ts)
  549:      end || C <- lists:seq($?, $Z) ++ lists:seq($a, $z)],
  550: 
  551:     [begin
  552:          L = "$\\" ++ [C],
  553:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},V}],
  554:          test_string(L, Ts)
  555:      end || {C,V} <- [{$n,$\n}, {$r,$\r}, {$t,$\t}, {$v,$\v},
  556:                       {$b,$\b}, {$f,$\f}, {$e,$\e}, {$s,$\s},
  557:                       {$d,$\d}]],
  558: 
  559:     EC = [$\n,$\r,$\t,$\v,$\b,$\f,$\e,$\s,$\d],
  560:     Ds = lists:seq($0, $9),
  561:     X = [$^,$n,$r,$t,$v,$b,$f,$e,$s,$d],
  562:     New = [${,$x],
  563:     No = EC ++ Ds ++ X ++ New,
  564:     [begin
  565:          L = "$\\" ++ [C],
  566:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  567:          test_string(L, Ts)
  568:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- No],
  569: 
  570:     [begin
  571:          L = "'$\\" ++ [C] ++ "'",
  572:          Ts = [{atom,{1,1},list_to_atom("$"++[C])}],
  573:          test_string(L, Ts)
  574:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- No],
  575: 
  576:     test_string("\"\\013a\\\n\"", [{string,{1,1},"\va\n"}]),
  577: 
  578:     test_string("'\n'", [{atom,{1,1},'\n'}]),
  579:     test_string("\"\n\a\"", [{string,{1,1},"\na"}]),
  580: 
  581:     %% No escape
  582:     [begin
  583:          L = "$" ++ [C],
  584:          Ts = [{char,{1,1},C}],
  585:          test_string(L, Ts)
  586:      end || C <- lists:seq(0, 255) -- (No ++ [$\\])],
  587:     test_string("$\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  588: 
  589:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,4}} =
  590:         erl_scan:string("$\\^",{1,1}),
  591:     test_string("$\\\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  592:     %% Robert's scanner returns line 1:
  593:     test_string("$\\\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  594:     test_string("$\n\n", [{char,{1,1},$\n}]),
  595:     test("$\n\n"),
  596:     ok.
  597: 
  598: 
  599: variables() ->
  600:     test_string("     \237_Aouåeiyäö", [{var,{1,7},'_Aouåeiyäö'}]),
  601:     test_string("A_b_c@", [{var,{1,1},'A_b_c@'}]),
  602:     test_string("V@2", [{var,{1,1},'V@2'}]),
  603:     test_string("ABDÀ", [{var,{1,1},'ABDÀ'}]),
  604:     test_string("Ärlig Östen", [{var,{1,1},'Ärlig'},{var,{1,7},'Östen'}]),
  605:     ok.
  606: 
  607: eof() ->
  608:     {done,{eof,1},eof} = erl_scan:tokens([], eof, 1),
  609:     {more, C1} = erl_scan:tokens([],"    \n", 1),
  610:     {done,{eof,2},eof} = erl_scan:tokens(C1, eof, 1),
  611:     {more, C2} = erl_scan:tokens([], "abra", 1),
  612:     %% An error before R13A.
  613:     %% {done,Err={error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  614:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,abra}],1},eof} =
  615:         erl_scan_tokens(C2, eof, 1),
  616: 
  617:     %% With column.
  618:     {more, C3} = erl_scan:tokens([],"    \n",{1,1}),
  619:     {done,{eof,{2,1}},eof} = erl_scan:tokens(C3, eof, 1),
  620:     {more, C4} = erl_scan:tokens([], "abra", {1,1}),
  621:     %% An error before R13A.
  622:     %% {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,scan},{1,5}},eof} =
  623:     {done,{ok,[{atom,_,abra}],{1,5}},eof} =
  624:         erl_scan_tokens(C4, eof, 1),
  625: 
  626:     %% Robert's scanner returns "" as LeftoverChars;
  627:     %% the R12B scanner returns eof as LeftoverChars: (eof is correct)
  628:     {more, C5} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a", 1),
  629:     %% An error before R13A.
  630:     %% {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  631:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,a}],1},eof} =
  632:         erl_scan_tokens(C5,eof,1),
  633: 
  634:     %% With column.
  635:     {more, C6} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a", {1,1}),
  636:     %% An error before R13A.
  637:     %% {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,scan},1},eof} =
  638:     {done,{ok,[{atom,{1,1},a}],{1,2}},eof} =
  639:         erl_scan_tokens(C6,eof,1),
  640: 
  641:     %% A dot followed by eof is special:
  642:     {more, C} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a.", 1),
  643:     {done,{ok,[{atom,1,a},{dot,1}],1},eof} = erl_scan_tokens(C,eof,1),
  644:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{dot,1}],1} = erl_scan_string("foo."),
  645: 
  646:     %% With column.
  647:     {more, CCol} = erl_scan:tokens([], "a.", {1,1}),
  648:     {done,{ok,[{atom,{1,1},a},{dot,{1,2}}],{1,3}},eof} =
  649:         erl_scan_tokens(CCol,eof,1),
  650:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},foo},{dot,{1,4}}],{1,5}} =
  651:         erl_scan_string("foo.", {1,1}, []),
  652: 
  653:     ok.
  654: 
  655: illegal() ->
  656:     Atom = lists:duplicate(1000, $a),
  657:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1} = erl_scan:string(Atom),
  658:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1},". "} =
  659:         erl_scan:tokens([], Atom++". ", 1),
  660:     QAtom = "'" ++ Atom ++ "'",
  661:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1} = erl_scan:string(QAtom),
  662:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},1},". "} =
  663:         erl_scan:tokens([], QAtom++". ", 1),
  664:     Var = lists:duplicate(1000, $A),
  665:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,var}},1} = erl_scan:string(Var),
  666:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,var}},1},". "} =
  667:         erl_scan:tokens([], Var++". ", 1),
  668:     Float = "1" ++ lists:duplicate(400, $0) ++ ".0",
  669:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1} = erl_scan:string(Float),
  670:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,float}},1},". "} =
  671:         erl_scan:tokens([], Float++". ", 1),
  672:     String = "\"43\\x{aaaaaa}34\"",
  673:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} = erl_scan:string(String),
  674:     {done,{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1},"34\". "} =
  675:         %% Would be nice if `34\"' were skipped...
  676:         %% Maybe, but then the LeftOverChars would not be the characters
  677:         %% immediately following the end location of the error.
  678:         erl_scan:tokens([], String++". ", 1),
  679: 
  680:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1001}} =
  681:         erl_scan:string(Atom, {1,1}),
  682:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1005}},". "} =
  683:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Atom++". ", {1,1}),
  684:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1003}} =
  685:         erl_scan:string(QAtom, {1,1}),
  686:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,atom}},{1,1007}},". "} =
  687:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++QAtom++". ", {1,1}),
  688:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,var}},{1,1001}} =
  689:         erl_scan:string(Var, {1,1}),
  690:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,var}},{1,1005}},". "} =
  691:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Var++". ", {1,1}),
  692:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,404}} =
  693:         erl_scan:string(Float, {1,1}),
  694:     {done,{error,{{1,5},erl_scan,{illegal,float}},{1,408}},". "} =
  695:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo "++Float++". ", {1,1}),
  696:     {error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,14}} =
  697:         erl_scan:string(String, {1,1}),
  698:     {done,{error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,14}},"34\". "} =
  699:         erl_scan:tokens([], String++". ", {1,1}),
  700: 
  701:     %% GH-6477. Test for illegal characters in caret notation.
  702:     _ = [begin
  703:              S = [$$,$\\,$^,C],
  704:              {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} = erl_scan:string(S)
  705:          end || C <- lists:seq(0, 16#3e) ++ [16#60] ++ lists:seq($z+1, 16#10ffff)],
  706:     ok.
  707: 
  708: crashes() ->
  709:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([-1])}), % type error
  710:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch erl_scan:string("'a" ++ [999999999] ++ "c'")),
  711: 
  712:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$"++[-1])}),
  713:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\"++[-1])}),
  714:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\^"++[-1])}),
  715:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",-1,$"],{1,1})}),
  716:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("\"\\v"++[-1,$"])}), %$"
  717:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",-1,$"])}),
  718:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[-1])}),
  719:     {'EXIT',_} =
  720:          (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[-1],{1,1})}),
  721: 
  722:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([a])}), % type error
  723:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$"++[a])}),
  724:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\"++[a])}),
  725:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("$\\^"++[a])}),
  726:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",a,$"],{1,1})}),
  727:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("\"\\v"++[a,$"])}), %$"
  728:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([$",a,$"])}),
  729:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[a])}),
  730:     {'EXIT',_} =
  731:          (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("% foo"++[a],{1,1})}),
  732: 
  733:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string([3.0])}), % type error
  734:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch {foo, erl_scan:string("A" ++ [999999999])}),
  735: 
  736:     ok.
  737: 
  738: options() ->
  739:     %% line and column are not options, but tested here
  740:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{white_space,1," "},{comment,1,"% bar"}], 1} =
  741:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return),
  742:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{white_space,1," "}],1} =
  743:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return_white_spaces),
  744:     {ok,[{atom,1,foo},{comment,1,"% bar"}],1} =
  745:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 1, return_comments),
  746:     {ok,[{atom,17,foo}],17} =
  747:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", 17),
  748:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
  749:         (catch {foo,
  750:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar", {a,1}, [])}), % type error
  751:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}],{17,18}} =
  752:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar", {17,9}, []),
  753:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} =
  754:         (catch {foo,
  755:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar", {1,0}, [])}), % type error
  756:     {ok,[{foo,1}],1} =
  757:         erl_scan_string("foo % bar",1, [{reserved_word_fun,
  758:                                          fun(W) -> W =:= foo end}]),
  759:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  760:         (catch {foo,
  761:                 erl_scan:string("foo % bar",1, % type error
  762:                                 [{reserved_word_fun,
  763:                                   fun(W,_) -> W =:= foo end}])}),
  764:     ok.
  765: 
  766: more_options() ->
  767:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T1],{19,20}} =
  768:         erl_scan:string("foo", {19,17},[]),
  769:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T1),
  770:     {done,{ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T2,{dot,_}],{19,22}},[]} =
  771:         erl_scan:tokens([], "foo. ", {19,17}, [bad_opt]), % type error
  772:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T2),
  773:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T3],{19,20}} =
  774:         erl_scan:string("foo", {19,17},[text]),
  775:     {19,17} = erl_scan:location(T3),
  776:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T3),
  777: 
  778:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T4],1} = erl_scan:string("foo", 1, [text]),
  779:     1 = erl_scan:line(T4),
  780:     1 = erl_scan:location(T4),
  781:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T4),
  782: 
  783:     ok.
  784: 
  785: token_info() ->
  786:     {ok,[T1],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,18}, [text]),
  787:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  788:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:category(foo)}), % type error
  789:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} =
  790:         (catch {foo, erl_scan:symbol(foo)}), % type error
  791:     atom = erl_scan:category(T1),
  792:     foo = erl_scan:symbol(T1),
  793: 
  794:     {ok,[T2],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 1, []),
  795:     1 = erl_scan:line(T2),
  796:     undefined = erl_scan:column(T2),
  797:     undefined = erl_scan:text(T2),
  798:     1 = erl_scan:location(T2),
  799: 
  800:     {ok,[T3],_} = erl_scan:string("=", 1, []),
  801:     '=' = erl_scan:category(T3),
  802:     '=' = erl_scan:symbol(T3),
  803:     ok.
  804: 
  805: anno_info() ->
  806:     {'EXIT',_} =
  807:         (catch {foo,erl_scan:line(foo)}), % type error
  808:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T0],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 19, [text]),
  809:     19 = erl_scan:location(T0),
  810:     19 = erl_scan:end_location(T0),
  811: 
  812:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T3],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,3}, [text]),
  813:     1 = erl_scan:line(T3),
  814:     3 = erl_scan:column(T3),
  815:     {1,3} = erl_scan:location(T3),
  816:     {1,6} = erl_scan:end_location(T3),
  817:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T3),
  818: 
  819:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T4],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", 2, [text]),
  820:     2 = erl_scan:line(T4),
  821:     undefined = erl_scan:column(T4),
  822:     2 = erl_scan:location(T4),
  823:     "foo" = erl_scan:text(T4),
  824: 
  825:     {ok,[{atom,_,foo}=T5],_} = erl_scan:string("foo", {1,3}, []),
  826:     1 = erl_scan:line(T5),
  827:     3 = erl_scan:column(T5),
  828:     {1,3} = erl_scan:location(T5),
  829:     undefined = erl_scan:text(T5),
  830: 
  831:     ok.
  832: 
  833: column_errors() ->
  834:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,atom,""}},{1,3}} = % $'
  835:         erl_scan:string("'\\",{1,1}),
  836:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,string,""}},{1,3}} = % $"
  837:         erl_scan:string("\"\\",{1,1}),
  838: 
  839:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,atom,""}},{1,2}} =  % $'
  840:         erl_scan:string("'",{1,1}),
  841:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,{unterminated,string,""}},{1,2}} =  % $"
  842:         erl_scan:string("\"",{1,1}),
  843: 
  844:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,2}} =
  845:         erl_scan:string("$",{1,1}),
  846: 
  847:     {error,{{1,3},erl_scan,
  848:             {unterminated,atom,"1234567890123456"}},{1,20}} = %'
  849:         erl_scan:string(" '12345678901234567", {1,1}),
  850:     {error,{{1,3},erl_scan,
  851:             {unterminated,atom,"123456789012345 "}}, {1,20}} = %'
  852:         erl_scan:string(" '123456789012345\\s", {1,1}),
  853:     {error,{{1,3},erl_scan,
  854:             {unterminated,string,"1234567890123456"}},{1,20}} = %"
  855:         erl_scan:string(" \"12345678901234567", {1,1}),
  856:     {error,{{1,3},erl_scan,
  857:             {unterminated,string,"123456789012345 "}}, {1,20}} = %"
  858:         erl_scan:string(" \"123456789012345\\s", {1,1}),
  859:     {error,{{1,3},erl_scan,
  860:             {unterminated,atom,"1234567890123456"}},{2,1}} = %'
  861:         erl_scan:string(" '12345678901234567\n", {1,1}),
  862:     ok.
  863: 
  864: white_spaces() ->
  865:     {ok,[{white_space,_,"\r"},
  866:                {white_space,_,"   "},
  867:                {atom,_,a},
  868:                {white_space,_,"\n"}],
  869:            _} = erl_scan_string("\r   a\n", {1,1}, return),
  870:     test("\r   a\n"),
  871:     L = "{\"a\nb\", \"a\\nb\",\nabc\r,def}.\n\n",
  872:     {ok,[{'{',_},
  873:                {string,_,"a\nb"},
  874:                {',',_},
  875:                {white_space,_," "},
  876:                {string,_,"a\nb"},
  877:                {',',_},
  878:                {white_space,_,"\n"},
  879:                {atom,_,abc},
  880:                {white_space,_,"\r"},
  881:                {',',_},
  882:                {atom,_,def},
  883:                {'}',_},
  884:                {dot,_},
  885:                {white_space,_,"\n"}],
  886:            _} = erl_scan_string(L, {1,1}, return),
  887:     test(L),
  888:     test("\"\n\"\n"),
  889:     test("\n\r\n"),
  890:     test("\n\r"),
  891:     test("\r\n"),
  892:     test("\n\f"),
  893:     [test(lists:duplicate(N, $\t)) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  894:     [test([$\n|lists:duplicate(N, $\t)]) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  895:     [test(lists:duplicate(N, $\s)) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  896:     [test([$\n|lists:duplicate(N, $\s)]) || N <- lists:seq(1, 20)],
  897:     test("\v\f\n\v "),
  898:     test("\n\e\n\b\f\n\da\n"),
  899:     ok.
  900: 
  901: unicode() ->
  902:     {ok,[{char,1,83},{integer,1,45}],1} =
  903:         erl_scan_string("$\\12345"), % not unicode
  904: 
  905:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
  906:         erl_scan:string([1089]),
  907:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
  908:         erl_scan:string([1089], {1,1}),
  909:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
  910:         erl_scan:string([16#D800], {1,1}),
  911: 
  912:     test("\"a"++[1089]++"b\""),
  913:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
  914:         erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,$^,1089], 1),
  915: 
  916:     {error,{1,erl_scan,Error},1} =
  917:         erl_scan:string("\"qa\x{aaa}", 1),
  918:     "unterminated string starting with \"qa"++[2730]++"\"" =
  919:         erl_scan:format_error(Error),
  920:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,_},{1,11}} =
  921:         erl_scan:string("\"qa\\x{aaa}",{1,1}),
  922:     {error,{{1,2},erl_scan,_},{1,11}} =
  923:         erl_scan:string("'qa\\x{aaa}",{1,1}),
  924: 
  925:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} =
  926:         erl_scan_string([$$,1089], 1),
  927:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} =
  928:         erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,1089], 1),
  929: 
  930:     Qs = "$\\x{aaa}",
  931:     {ok,[{char,1,$\x{aaa}}],1} =
  932:         erl_scan_string(Qs, 1),
  933:     {ok,[Q2],{1,9}} =
  934:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{aaa}", {1,1}, [text]),
  935:     [{category,char},{column,1},{line,1},{symbol,16#aaa},{text,Qs}] =
  936:         token_info_long(Q2),
  937: 
  938:     U1 = "\"\\x{aaa}\"",
  939:     {ok,[{string,_,[2730]}=T1],{1,10}} = erl_scan:string(U1, {1,1}, [text]),
  940:     {1,1} = erl_scan:location(T1),
  941:     "\"\\x{aaa}\"" = erl_scan:text(T1),
  942:     {ok,[{string,1,[2730]}],1} = erl_scan_string(U1, 1),
  943: 
  944:     U2 = "\"\\x41\\x{fff}\\x42\"",
  945:     {ok,[{string,1,[$\x41,$\x{fff},$\x42]}],1} = erl_scan_string(U2, 1),
  946: 
  947:     U3 = "\"a\n\\x{fff}\n\"",
  948:     {ok,[{string,1,[$a,$\n,$\x{fff},$\n]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U3, 1),
  949: 
  950:     U4 = "\"\n\\x{aaa}\n\"",
  951:     {ok,[{string,1,[$\n,$\x{aaa},$\n]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U4, 1),
  952: 
  953:     %% Keep these tests:
  954:     test(Qs),
  955:     test(U1),
  956:     test(U2),
  957:     test(U3),
  958:     test(U4),
  959: 
  960:     Str1 = "\"ab" ++ [1089] ++ "cd\"",
  961:     {ok,[{string,1,[$a,$b,1089,$c,$d]}],1} = erl_scan_string(Str1, 1),
  962:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},[$a,$b,1089,$c,$d]}],{1,8}} =
  963:         erl_scan_string(Str1, {1,1}),
  964:     test(Str1),
  965:     Comment = "%% "++[1089],
  966:     {ok,[{comment,1,[$%,$%,$\s,1089]}],1} =
  967:         erl_scan_string(Comment, 1, [return]),
  968:     {ok,[{comment,{1,1},[$%,$%,$\s,1089]}],{1,5}} =
  969:         erl_scan_string(Comment, {1,1}, [return]),
  970:     ok.
  971: 
  972: more_chars() ->
  973:     %% Due to unicode, the syntax has been incompatibly augmented:
  974:     %% $\x{...}, $\xHH
  975: 
  976:     %% All kinds of tests...
  977:     {ok,[{char,_,123}],{1,4}} =
  978:         erl_scan_string("$\\{",{1,1}),
  979:     {more, C1} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\{", {1,1}),
  980:     {done,{ok,[{char,_,123}],{1,4}},eof} =
  981:         erl_scan_tokens(C1, eof, 1),
  982:     {ok,[{char,1,123},{atom,1,a},{'}',1}],1} =
  983:         erl_scan_string("$\\{a}"),
  984: 
  985:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,4}} =
  986:         erl_scan:string("$\\x", {1,1}),
  987:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,5}} =
  988:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{",{1,1}),
  989:     {more, C3} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\x", {1,1}),
  990:     {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,4}},eof} =
  991:         erl_scan:tokens(C3, eof, 1),
  992:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,5}} =
  993:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{",{1,1}),
  994:     {more, C2} = erl_scan:tokens([], "$\\x{", {1,1}),
  995:     {done,{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{unterminated,char}},{1,5}},eof} =
  996:         erl_scan:tokens(C2, eof, 1),
  997:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
  998:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{g}"),
  999:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,5}} =
 1000:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{g}", {1,1}),
 1001:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,6}} =
 1002:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{}",{1,1}),
 1003: 
 1004:     test("\"\\{0}\""),
 1005:     test("\"\\x{0}\""),
 1006:     test("\'\\{0}\'"),
 1007:     test("\'\\x{0}\'"),
 1008: 
 1009:     {error,{{2,3},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{2,6}} =
 1010:         erl_scan:string("\"ab \n $\\x{g}\"",{1,1}),
 1011:     {error,{{2,3},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{2,6}} =
 1012:         erl_scan:string("\'ab \n $\\x{g}\'",{1,1}),
 1013: 
 1014:     test("$\\{34}"),
 1015:     test("$\\x{34}"),
 1016:     test("$\\{377}"),
 1017:     test("$\\x{FF}"),
 1018:     test("$\\{400}"),
 1019:     test("$\\x{100}"),
 1020:     test("$\\x{10FFFF}"),
 1021:     test("$\\x{10ffff}"),
 1022:     test("\"$\n \\{1}\""),
 1023:     {error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
 1024:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{110000}"),
 1025:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,12}} =
 1026:         erl_scan:string("$\\x{110000}", {1,1}),
 1027: 
 1028:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
 1029:         erl_scan:string("$\\xfg", {1,1}),
 1030: 
 1031:     test("$\\xffg"),
 1032: 
 1033:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,4}} =
 1034:         erl_scan:string("$\\xg", {1,1}),
 1035:     ok.

 1037: %% OTP-10302. Unicode characters scanner/parser.
 1038: otp_10302(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1039:     %% From unicode():
 1040:     {ok,[{atom,1,'aсb'}],1} =
 1041:         erl_scan_string("'a"++[1089]++"b'", 1),
 1042:     {ok,[{atom,{1,1},'qaપ'}],{1,12}} =
 1043:         erl_scan_string("'qa\\x{aaa}'",{1,1}),
 1044: 
 1045:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} = erl_scan_string([$$,1089], 1),
 1046:     {ok,[{char,1,1089}],1} = erl_scan_string([$$,$\\,1089],1),
 1047: 
 1048:     Qs = "$\\x{aaa}",
 1049:     {ok,[{char,1,2730}],1} = erl_scan_string(Qs, 1),
 1050:     {ok,[Q2],{1,9}} = erl_scan:string(Qs,{1,1},[text]),
 1051:     [{category,char},{column,1},{line,1},{symbol,16#aaa},{text,Qs}] =
 1052:         token_info_long(Q2),
 1053: 
 1054:     U1 = "\"\\x{aaa}\"",
 1055:     {ok,[T1],{1,10}} = erl_scan:string(U1, {1,1}, [text]),
 1056:     [{category,string},{column,1},{line,1},{symbol,[16#aaa]},{text,U1}] =
 1057:         token_info_long(T1),

 1060:     {ok,[{string,1,[65,4095,66]}],1} = erl_scan_string(U2, 1),
 1061: 
 1062:     U3 = "\"a\n\\x{fff}\n\"",
 1063:     {ok,[{string,1,[97,10,4095,10]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U3, 1),
 1064: 
 1065:     U4 = "\"\n\\x{aaa}\n\"",
 1066:     {ok,[{string,1,[10,2730,10]}],3} = erl_scan_string(U4, 1,[]),
 1067: 
 1068:     Str1 = "\"ab" ++ [1089] ++ "cd\"",
 1069:     {ok,[{string,1,[97,98,1089,99,100]}],1} =

 1072:         erl_scan_string(Str1, {1,1}),
 1073: 
 1074:     OK1 = 16#D800-1,
 1075:     OK2 = 16#DFFF+1,
 1076:     OK3 = 16#FFFE-1,
 1077:     OK4 = 16#FFFF+1,
 1078:     OKL = [OK1,OK2,OK3,OK4],

 1085:

 1088:         OK <- OKL],
 1089:     {ok,[{comment,_,[$%,$%,$\s,OK1]}],{1,5}} =
 1090:         erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK1], {1,1}, [return]),
 1091:     [{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
 1092:          erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal], 1, [return]) ||
 1093:         Illegal <- IllegalL],
 1094:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,5}} =
 1095:         erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal1], {1,1}, [return]),
 1096:

 1098:         OK <- OKL],
 1099:     {ok,[],{1,5}} = erl_scan_string("%% "++[OK1], {1,1}, []),
 1100:     [{error,{1,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},1} =
 1101:          erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal], 1, []) ||
 1102:         Illegal <- IllegalL],
 1103:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,5}} =
 1104:         erl_scan:string("%% "++[Illegal1], {1,1}, []),
 1105:

 1110:          erl_scan:string("\""++[OK]++"\"",{1,1}) ||
 1111:         OK <- IllegalL],
 1112: 
 1113:     [{error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
 1114:         erl_scan:string([Illegal],{1,1}) ||
 1115:         Illegal <- IllegalL],
 1116: 
 1117:     {ok,[{char,{1,1},OK1}],{1,3}} =

 1119:     {error,{{1,1},erl_scan,{illegal,character}},{1,2}} =
 1120:         erl_scan:string([$$,Illegal1],{1,1}),
 1121:

 1140:     {nil,0} = erl_parse_abstract([]),

 1149:      {integer,0,$a},

 1151:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++[55296]++"c"),
 1152: 
 1153:     Line = 17,
 1154:     {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Line),
 1155:     Float = 3.14, {float,Line,Float} = erl_parse_abstract(Float, Line),
 1156:     {nil,Line} = erl_parse_abstract([], Line),
 1157:     {bin,Line,
 1158:      [{bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,1},default,default},

 1160:         erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>, Line),
 1161:     {cons,Line,{tuple,Line,[{atom,Line,a}]},{atom,Line,b}} =
 1162:         erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b], Line),

 1167:         erl_parse_abstract("a"++[55296]++"c", Line),
 1168:

 1171:     Float = 3.14, {float,Line,Float} = erl_parse_abstract(Float, Opts1),

 1174:      [{bin_element,Line,{integer,Line,1},default,default},

 1176:         erl_parse_abstract(<<1,2>>, Opts1),

 1178:         erl_parse_abstract([{a} | b], Opts1),

 1184: 
 1185:     [begin

 1213: otp_10992(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1214:     {cons,0,{float,0,42.0},{nil,0}} =
 1215:         erl_parse_abstract([42.0], [{encoding,unicode}]),

 1224: %% OTP-11807. Generalize erl_parse:abstract/2.
 1225: otp_11807(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1226:     {cons,0,{integer,0,97},{cons,0,{integer,0,98},{nil,0}}} =

 1229:         erl_parse_abstract([-1], [{encoding,latin1}]),
 1230:     ASCII = fun(I) -> I >= 0 andalso I < 128 end,
 1231:     {string,0,"xyz"} = erl_parse_abstract("xyz", [{encoding,ASCII}]),

 1233:         erl_parse_abstract([228], [{encoding,ASCII}]),

 1245: otp_17024(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1246:     Line = 17,
 1247:     Opts1 = [{location,Line}],
 1248:     {integer,Line,1} = erl_parse_abstract(1, Opts1),

 1254: 
 1255: text_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1256:     KeepClass = fun(Class) ->
 1257:                         fun(C, _) -> C == Class end
 1258:                 end,
 1259: 
 1260:     Join = fun(L, S) -> string:join(L, S) end,
 1261:     String = fun(L) -> Join(L, " ") end,
 1262: 
 1263:     TextAtom = KeepClass(atom),
 1264:     TextInt = KeepClass(integer),
 1265:     %% Keep text for integers written with a base.
 1266:     TextBase = fun(C, S) ->
 1267:                        C == integer andalso string:find(S, "#") /= nomatch
 1268:                end,
 1269:     %% Keep text for long strings, regardless of class
 1270:     TextLong = fun(_, S) -> length(S) > 10 end,
 1271: 
 1272:     Texts = fun(Toks) -> [erl_scan:text(T) || T <- Toks] end,
 1273:     Values =  fun(Toks) -> [erl_scan:symbol(T) || T <- Toks] end,
 1274: 
 1275:     Atom1 = "foo",
 1276:     Atom2 = "'this is a long atom'",
 1277:     Int1 = "42",
 1278:     Int2 = "16#10",
 1279:     Int3 = "8#20",
 1280:     Int4 = "16",
 1281:     Int5 = "12345678901234567890",
 1282:     String1 = "\"A String\"",
 1283:     String2 = "\"guitar string\"",
 1284:     Name1 = "Short",
 1285:     Name2 = "LongAndDescriptiveName",
 1286:     Sep1 = "{",
 1287:     Sep2 = "+",
 1288:     Sep3 = "]",
 1289:     Sep4 = "/",
 1290: 
 1291:     All = [Atom1, Atom2, Int1, Int2, Int3, Int4, Int5,
 1292:            String1, String2, Name1, Name2,
 1293:            Sep1, Sep2, Sep3, Sep4],
 1294: 
 1295:     {ok, Tokens0, 2} =
 1296:         erl_scan:string(String([Atom1, Int1]), 2, [{text_fun, TextAtom}]),
 1297:     [Atom1, undefined] = Texts(Tokens0),
 1298:     [foo, 42] = Values(Tokens0),
 1299: 
 1300:     {ok, Tokens1, 3} =
 1301:         erl_scan:string(Join([Int2, Int3, Int4], "\n"), 1,
 1302:                         [{text_fun, TextInt}]),
 1303:     [Int2, Int3, Int4] = Texts(Tokens1),
 1304:     [16, 16, 16] = Values(Tokens1),
 1305: 
 1306:     TS = [Int2, String1, Atom1, Int3, Int4, String2],
 1307:     {ok, Tokens2, 6} =
 1308:         %% If text is present, we supply text for *all* tokens.
 1309:         erl_scan:string(Join(TS, "\n"), 1, [{text_fun, TextAtom}, text]),
 1310:     TS = Texts(Tokens2),
 1311:     [16, "A String", foo, 16, 16, "guitar string"] = Values(Tokens2),
 1312: 
 1313:     Ints = [Int1, Int2, Int3, Int4],
 1314:     {ok, Tokens3, 1} = erl_scan:string(String(Ints), 1, [{text_fun, TextBase}]),
 1315:     [undefined, Int2, Int3, undefined] = Texts(Tokens3),
 1316:     [42, 16, 16, 16] = Values(Tokens3),
 1317: 
 1318:     Longs = lists:filter(fun(S) -> length(S) > 10 end, All),
 1319:     {ok, Tokens4, 1} =
 1320:         erl_scan:string(String(All), 1, [{text_fun, TextLong}]),
 1321:     Longs = lists:filter(fun(T) -> T /= undefined end, Texts(Tokens4)),
 1322: 
 1323:     {ok, Tokens5, 7} =
 1324:         erl_scan:string(String(All), 7, [{text_fun, KeepClass('{')}]),
 1325:     [Sep1] = lists:filter(fun(T) -> T /= undefined end, Texts(Tokens5)).
 1326: 
 1327: triple_quoted_string(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1328:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],2} =
 1329:         erl_scan:string(
 1330:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1331:           "\"\"\""),
 1332: 
 1333:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1334:         erl_scan:string(
 1335:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1336:           "\n"
 1337:           "\"\"\""),
 1338: 
 1339:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1340:         erl_scan:string(
 1341:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1342:           " \n"
 1343:           " \"\"\""),
 1344: 
 1345:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1346:         erl_scan:string(
 1347:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1348:           "\n"
 1349:           " \"\"\""),
 1350: 
 1351:     {ok,[{string,1,""}],3} =
 1352:         erl_scan:string(
 1353:           "\"\"\"\r\n"
 1354:           "  \r\n"
 1355:           "  \"\"\""),
 1356: 
 1357:     {error,{{2,2},erl_scan,indentation},{3,6}} =
 1358:         erl_scan:string(
 1359:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1360:           " \n" % One space too little indentation
 1361:           "  \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1362: 
 1363:     {ok,[{string,1,"\n"}],4} =
 1364:         erl_scan:string(
 1365:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1366:           "\n"
 1367:           "\n"
 1368:           "\"\"\""),
 1369: 
 1370:     {ok,[{string,1,"\r\n"}],4} =
 1371:         erl_scan:string(
 1372:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1373:           "  \r\n"
 1374:           "  \n"
 1375:           "  \"\"\""),
 1376: 
 1377:     {ok,[{string,1,"\n"}],4} =
 1378:         erl_scan:string(
 1379:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1380:           "  \n"
 1381:           "\r\n"
 1382:           "  \"\"\""),
 1383: 
 1384:     {ok,[{string,1,"\r\n"}],4} =
 1385:         erl_scan:string(
 1386:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1387:           "\r\n"
 1388:           "  \n"
 1389:           "  \"\"\""),
 1390: 
 1391:     {error,{{3,2},erl_scan,indentation},{4,6}} =
 1392:         erl_scan:string(
 1393:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1394:           "  \n"
 1395:           " \r\n"
 1396:           "  \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1397: 
 1398:     {error,{{2,3},erl_scan,indentation},{4,7}} =
 1399:         erl_scan:string(
 1400:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1401:           "  \n" % One space too little indentation
 1402:           "   \r\n"
 1403:           "   \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1404: 
 1405:     {ok,[{string,1,"CR LF"}],3} =
 1406:         erl_scan:string(
 1407:           "\"\"\" \t\r\n"
 1408:           "CR LF\r\n"
 1409:           "\"\"\""),
 1410: 
 1411:     {ok,[{string,1,"this is a\nvery long\nstring"}],5} =
 1412:         erl_scan:string(
 1413:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1414:           "this is a\n"
 1415:           "very long\n"
 1416:           "string\n"
 1417:           "\"\"\""),
 1418: 
 1419:     {ok,[{string,1,"this is a\r\nvery long\r\nstring"}],5} =
 1420:         erl_scan:string(
 1421:           "\"\"\"\r\n"
 1422:           "  this is a\r\n"
 1423:           "  very long\r\n"
 1424:           "  string\r\n"
 1425:           "  \"\"\""),
 1426: 
 1427:     {ok,
 1428:      [{string,1,
 1429:        "this is a string\r\n"
 1430:        "\n"
 1431:        "\r\n"
 1432:        "with three empty lines\n"
 1433:        "\r\n"}],
 1434:      8} =
 1435:         erl_scan:string(
 1436:           "\"\"\"\r\n"
 1437:           "  this is a string\r\n"
 1438:           "\n"
 1439:           "  \r\n"
 1440:           "  with three empty lines\n"
 1441:           "\r\n"
 1442:           "\n"
 1443:           "  \"\"\""),
 1444: 
 1445:     {ok,[{string,1,"  this is a\n    very long\n  string"}],5} =
 1446:         erl_scan:string(
 1447:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1448:           "\t  this is a\n"
 1449:           "\t    very long\n"
 1450:           "\t  string\n"
 1451:           "\t\"\"\""),
 1452: 
 1453:     {ok,[{string,1,"this is a \\\\\nvery long \\\\\nstring\\\\"}],5} =
 1454:         erl_scan:string(
 1455:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1456:           "this is a \\\\\n"
 1457:           "very long \\\\\n"
 1458:           "string\\\\\n"
 1459:           "\"\"\""),
 1460: 
 1461:     {ok,[{string,1,
 1462:           "this contains \"quotes\"\n"
 1463:           "and \"\"\"triple quotes\"\"\"\n"
 1464:           " \"\" \"\"\" and\n"
 1465:           "ends here"}],6} =
 1466:         erl_scan:string(
 1467:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1468:           "this contains \"quotes\"\n"
 1469:           "and \"\"\"triple quotes\"\"\"\n"
 1470:           " \"\" \"\"\" and\n"
 1471:           "ends here\n"
 1472:           "\"\"\""),
 1473: 
 1474:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},
 1475:           "```erlang\n"
 1476:           "foo() ->\n"
 1477:           "    \"\"\"\n"
 1478:           "    foo\n"
 1479:           "    bar\n"
 1480:           "    \"\"\".\n"
 1481:           "```"}],{9,5}} =
 1482:         erl_scan:string(
 1483:           "\"\"\"\"\n"
 1484:           "```erlang\n"
 1485:           "foo() ->\n"
 1486:           "    \"\"\"\n"
 1487:           "    foo\n"
 1488:           "    bar\n"
 1489:           "    \"\"\".\n"
 1490:           "```\n"
 1491:           "\"\"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1492: 
 1493:     {ok,[{string,{1,1},"5-quoted"}],{3,8}} =
 1494:         erl_scan:string(
 1495:           "\"\"\"\"\"\n"
 1496:           "  5-quoted\n"
 1497:           "  \"\"\"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1498: 
 1499:     {error,{{1,4},erl_scan,white_space},{2,4}} =
 1500:         erl_scan:string(
 1501:           "\"\"\"foo\n" % Only white-space allowed after opening quote seq
 1502:           "\"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1503: 
 1504:     {error,{{2,2},erl_scan,indentation},{3,6}} =
 1505:         erl_scan:string(
 1506:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1507:           " foo\n" % One space too little indentation
 1508:           "  \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1509: 
 1510:     {error,{{2,8},erl_scan,indentation},{3,12}} =
 1511:         erl_scan:string(
 1512:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1513:           "       \tfoo\n" % The tab shoud be a space
 1514:           "        \"\"\"", {1,1}, []),
 1515: 
 1516:     {error,{{1,4},erl_scan,{unterminated,{string,3},"\n\tx\n\t\"\""}},{3,4}} =
 1517:         erl_scan:string(
 1518:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1519:           "\tx\n"
 1520:           "\t\"\"", % Lacking one double-quote char in closing seq
 1521:           {1,1}, []),
 1522: 
 1523:     {error,{{3,4},erl_scan,string_concat},{3,4}} =
 1524:         erl_scan:string(
 1525:           "\"\"\"\n"
 1526:           "x\n"
 1527:           "\"\"\"\"",
 1528:           %% Bad end delimiter: adjacent string start without white space
 1529:           {1,1}, []),
 1530: 
 1531:     {error,{{3,2},erl_scan,string_concat},{3,2}} =
 1532:         erl_scan:string(
 1533:           "\"\n"
 1534:           "x\n"
 1535:           "\"\"\"",
 1536:           %% False triple-quote: adjacent string start without white space
 1537:           {1,1}, []),
 1538: 
 1539:     {error,{{1,6},erl_scan,string_concat},{1,6}} =
 1540:         %% Adjacent string start without white space
 1541:         erl_scan:string("\"abc\"\"def\"", {1,1}, []),
 1542: 
 1543:     {ok,[{string,1,[16#D000]}],3} =
 1544:         erl_scan:string(
 1545:           [$",$",$",$\n,
 1546:            16#D000,$\n, % Unicode character
 1547:            $",$",$"]),
 1548: 
 1549:     {error,{2,erl_scan,{illegal,character}},2} =
 1550:         erl_scan:string(
 1551:           [$",$",$",$\n,
 1552:            16#FFFF,$\n, % Out of Unicode range
 1553:            $",$",$"]),
 1554: 
 1555:     %% Test the real deal in this source code
 1556:     """"
 1557:     ```erlang
 1558:     foo() ->
 1559:         """
 1560:         \foo
 1561:         \bar
 1562:         """.
 1563:     ```
 1564:     """"
 1565:         =
 1566:         "```erlang
 1567: foo() ->
 1568:     \"\"\"
 1569:     \\foo
 1570:     \\bar
 1571:     \"\"\".
 1572: ```",
 1573:     ok.
 1574: 
 1575: test_string(String, ExpectedWithCol) ->
 1576:     {ok, ExpectedWithCol, _EndWithCol} = erl_scan_string(String, {1, 1}, []),
 1577:     Expected = [ begin
 1578:                      {L,_C} = element(2, T),
 1579:                      setelement(2, T, L)
 1580:                  end
 1581:                     || T <- ExpectedWithCol ],
 1582:     {ok, Expected, _End} = erl_scan_string(String),
 1583:     test(String).
 1584: 
 1585: erl_scan_string(String) ->
 1586:     erl_scan_string(String, 1, []).
 1587: 
 1588: erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation) ->
 1589:     erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation, []).
 1590: 
 1591: erl_scan_string(String, StartLocation, Options) ->
 1592:     case erl_scan:string(String, StartLocation, Options) of
 1593:         {ok, Tokens, EndLocation} ->
 1594:             {ok, unopaque_tokens(Tokens), EndLocation};
 1595:         Else ->
 1596:             Else
 1597:     end.
 1598: 
 1599: erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L) ->
 1600:     erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L, []).
 1601: 
 1602: erl_scan_tokens(C, S, L, O) ->
 1603:     case erl_scan:tokens(C, S, L, O) of
 1604:         {done, {ok, Ts, End}, R} ->
 1605:             {done, {ok, unopaque_tokens(Ts), End}, R};
 1606:         Else ->
 1607:             Else
 1608:     end.
 1609: 
 1610: unopaque_tokens([]) ->
 1611:     [];
 1612: unopaque_tokens([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1613:     Attrs = element(2, Token),
 1614:     Term = erl_anno:to_term(Attrs),
 1615:     T = setelement(2, Token, Term),
 1616:     [T | unopaque_tokens(Tokens)].
 1617: 
 1618: erl_parse_abstract(Term) ->
 1619:     erl_parse_abstract(Term, []).
 1620: 
 1621: erl_parse_abstract(Term, Options) ->
 1622:     Abstr = erl_parse:abstract(Term, Options),
 1623:     unopaque_abstract(Abstr).
 1624: 
 1625: unopaque_abstract(Abstr) ->
 1626:     erl_parse:anno_to_term(Abstr).
 1627: 
 1628: %% test_string(String, Expected, StartLocation, Options) ->
 1629: %%     {ok, Expected, _End} = erl_scan:string(String, StartLocation, Options),
 1630: %%     test(String).
 1631: 
 1632: %% There are no checks of the tags...
 1633: test(String) ->
 1634:     %% io:format("Testing `~ts'~n", [String]),
 1635:     [{Tokens, End},
 1636:      {Wtokens, Wend},
 1637:      {Ctokens, Cend},
 1638:      {CWtokens, CWend},
 1639:      {CWtokens2, _}] =
 1640:         [scan_string_with_column(String, X) ||
 1641:             X <- [[],
 1642:                   [return_white_spaces],
 1643:                   [return_comments],
 1644:                   [return],
 1645:                   [return]]], % for white space compaction test
 1646: 
 1647:     {end1,End,Wend} = {end1,Wend,End},
 1648:     {end2,Wend,Cend} = {end2,Cend,Wend},
 1649:     {end3,Cend,CWend} = {end3,CWend,Cend},
 1650: 
 1651:     %% Test that the tokens that are common to two token lists are identical.
 1652:     {none,Tokens} = {none, filter_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space,comment])},
 1653:     {comments,Ctokens} =
 1654:         {comments,filter_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space])},
 1655:     {white_spaces,Wtokens} =
 1656:         {white_spaces,filter_tokens(CWtokens, [comment])},
 1657: 
 1658:     %% Use token attributes to extract parts from the original string,
 1659:     %% and check that the parts are identical to the token strings.
 1660:     {Line,Column} = test_decorated_tokens(String, CWtokens),
 1661:     {deco,{Line,Column},End} = {deco,End,{Line,Column}},
 1662: 
 1663:     %% Almost the same again: concat texts to get the original:
 1664:     Text = get_text(CWtokens),
 1665:     {text,Text,String} = {text,String,Text},
 1666: 
 1667:     %% Test that white spaces occupy less heap than the worst case.
 1668:     ok = test_white_space_compaction(CWtokens, CWtokens2),
 1669: 
 1670:     %% Test that white newlines are always first in text:
 1671:     WhiteTokens = select_tokens(CWtokens, [white_space]),
 1672:     ok = newlines_first(WhiteTokens),
 1673: 
 1674:     %% Line attribute only:
 1675:     [Simple,Wsimple,Csimple,WCsimple] = Simples =
 1676:         [element(2, erl_scan:string(String, 1, Opts)) ||
 1677:             Opts <- [[],
 1678:                      [return_white_spaces],
 1679:                      [return_comments],
 1680:                      [return]]],
 1681:     {consistent,true} = {consistent,consistent_attributes(Simples)},
 1682:     {simple_wc,WCsimple} = {simple_wc,simplify(CWtokens)},
 1683:     {simple,Simple} = {simple,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [white_space,comment])},
 1684:     {simple_c,Csimple} = {simple_c,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [white_space])},
 1685:     {simple_w,Wsimple} = {simple_w,filter_tokens(WCsimple, [comment])},
 1686: 
 1687:     %% Line attribute only, with text:
 1688:     [SimpleTxt,WsimpleTxt,CsimpleTxt,WCsimpleTxt] = SimplesTxt =
 1689:         [element(2, erl_scan:string(String, 1, [text|Opts])) ||
 1690:             Opts <- [[],
 1691:                      [return_white_spaces],
 1692:                      [return_comments],
 1693:                      [return]]],
 1694:     TextTxt = get_text(WCsimpleTxt),
 1695:     {text_txt,TextTxt,String} = {text_txt,String,TextTxt},
 1696:     {consistent_txt,true} =
 1697:         {consistent_txt,consistent_attributes(SimplesTxt)},
 1698:     {simple_txt,SimpleTxt} =
 1699:         {simple_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [white_space,comment])},
 1700:     {simple_c_txt,CsimpleTxt} =
 1701:         {simple_c_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [white_space])},
 1702:     {simple_w_txt,WsimpleTxt} =
 1703:         {simple_w_txt,filter_tokens(WCsimpleTxt, [comment])},
 1704: 
 1705:     ok.
 1706: 
 1707: test_white_space_compaction(Tokens, Tokens2) when Tokens =:= Tokens2 ->
 1708:     [WS, WS2] = [select_tokens(Ts, [white_space]) || Ts <- [Tokens, Tokens2]],
 1709:     test_wsc(WS, WS2).
 1710: 
 1711: test_wsc([], []) ->
 1712:     ok;
 1713: test_wsc([Token|Tokens], [Token2|Tokens2]) ->
 1714:     [Text, Text2] = [Text ||
 1715:                         Text <- [erl_scan:text(T) || T <- [Token, Token2]]],
 1716:     Sz = erts_debug:size(Text),
 1717:     Sz2 = erts_debug:size({Text, Text2}),
 1718:     IsCompacted = Sz2 < 2*Sz+erts_debug:size({a,a}),
 1719:     ToBeCompacted = is_compacted(Text),
 1720:     if
 1721:         IsCompacted =:= ToBeCompacted ->
 1722:             test_wsc(Tokens, Tokens2);
 1723:         true ->
 1724:             {compaction_error, Token}
 1725:     end.
 1726: 
 1727: is_compacted("\r") ->
 1728:     true;
 1729: is_compacted("\n\r") ->
 1730:     true;
 1731: is_compacted("\n\f") ->
 1732:     true;
 1733: is_compacted([$\n|String]) ->
 1734:       all_spaces(String)
 1735:     orelse
 1736:       all_tabs(String);
 1737: is_compacted(String) ->
 1738:       all_spaces(String)
 1739:     orelse
 1740:       all_tabs(String).
 1741: 
 1742: all_spaces(L) ->
 1743:     all_same(L, $\s).
 1744: 
 1745: all_tabs(L) ->
 1746:     all_same(L, $\t).
 1747: 
 1748: all_same(L, Char) ->
 1749:     lists:all(fun(C) -> C =:= Char end, L).
 1750: 
 1751: newlines_first([]) ->
 1752:     ok;
 1753: newlines_first([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1754:     Text = erl_scan:text(Token),
 1755:     Nnls = length([C || C <- Text, C =:= $\n]),
 1756:     OK = case Text of
 1757:              [$\n|_] ->
 1758:                  Nnls =:= 1;
 1759:              _ ->
 1760:                  Nnls =:= 0
 1761:          end,
 1762:     if
 1763:         OK -> newlines_first(Tokens);
 1764:         true -> OK
 1765:     end.
 1766: 
 1767: filter_tokens(Tokens, Tags) ->
 1768:     lists:filter(fun(T) -> not lists:member(element(1, T), Tags) end, Tokens).
 1769: 
 1770: select_tokens(Tokens, Tags) ->
 1771:     lists:filter(fun(T) -> lists:member(element(1, T), Tags) end, Tokens).
 1772: 
 1773: simplify([Token|Tokens]) ->
 1774:     Line = erl_scan:line(Token),
 1775:     [setelement(2, Token, erl_anno:new(Line)) | simplify(Tokens)];
 1776: simplify([]) ->
 1777:     [].
 1778: 
 1779: get_text(Tokens) ->
 1780:     lists:flatten(
 1781:       [T ||
 1782:           Token <- Tokens,
 1783:           (T = erl_scan:text(Token)) =/= []]).
 1784: 
 1785: test_decorated_tokens(String, Tokens) ->
 1786:     ToksAttrs = token_attrs(Tokens),
 1787:     test_strings(ToksAttrs, String, 1, 1).
 1788: 
 1789: token_attrs(Tokens) ->
 1790:     [{L,C,length(T),T} ||
 1791:         Token <- Tokens,
 1792:         ([C,L,T] = token_info(Token)) =/= []].
 1793: 
 1794: token_info(T) ->
 1795:     Column = erl_scan:column(T),
 1796:     Line = erl_scan:line(T),
 1797:     Text = erl_scan:text(T),
 1798:     [Column, Line, Text].
 1799: 
 1800: token_info_long(T) ->
 1801:     Column = erl_scan:column(T),
 1802:     Line = erl_scan:line(T),
 1803:     Text = erl_scan:text(T),
 1804:     Category = erl_scan:category(T),
 1805:     Symbol = erl_scan:symbol(T),
 1806:     [{category,Category},{column,Column},{line,Line},
 1807:      {symbol,Symbol},{text,Text}].
 1808: 
 1809: test_strings([], _S, Line, Column) ->
 1810:     {Line,Column};
 1811: test_strings([{L,C,Len,T}=Attr|Attrs], String0, Line0, Column0) ->
 1812:     {String1, Column1} = skip_newlines(String0, L, Line0, Column0),
 1813:     String = skip_chars(String1, C-Column1),
 1814:     {Str,Rest} = lists:split(Len, String),
 1815:     if
 1816:         Str =:= T ->
 1817:             {Line,Column} = string_newlines(T, L, C),
 1818:             test_strings(Attrs, Rest, Line, Column);
 1819:         true ->
 1820:             {token_error, Attr, Str}
 1821:     end.
 1822: 
 1823: skip_newlines(String, Line, Line, Column) ->
 1824:     {String, Column};
 1825: skip_newlines([$\n|String], L, Line, _Column) ->
 1826:     skip_newlines(String, L, Line+1, 1);
 1827: skip_newlines([_|String], L, Line, Column) ->
 1828:     skip_newlines(String, L, Line, Column+1).
 1829: 
 1830: skip_chars(String, 0) ->
 1831:     String;
 1832: skip_chars([_|String], N) ->
 1833:     skip_chars(String, N-1).
 1834: 
 1835: string_newlines([$\n|String], Line, _Column) ->
 1836:     string_newlines(String, Line+1, 1);
 1837: string_newlines([], Line, Column) ->
 1838:     {Line, Column};
 1839: string_newlines([_|String], Line, Column) ->
 1840:     string_newlines(String, Line, Column+1).
 1841: 
 1842: scan_string_with_column(String, Options0) ->
 1843:     Options = [text | Options0],
 1844:     StartLoc = {1, 1},
 1845:     {ok, Ts1, End1} = erl_scan:string(String, StartLoc, Options),
 1846:     TString = String ++ ". ",
 1847:     {ok,Ts2,End2} = scan_tokens(TString, Options, [], StartLoc),
 1848:     {ok, Ts3, End3} =
 1849:         scan_tokens_1({more, []}, TString, Options, [], StartLoc),
 1850:     {end_2,End2,End3} = {end_2,End3,End2},
 1851:     {EndLine1,EndColumn1} = End1,
 1852:     End2 = {EndLine1,EndColumn1+2},
 1853:     {ts_1,Ts2,Ts3} = {ts_1,Ts3,Ts2},
 1854:     Ts2 = Ts1 ++ [lists:last(Ts2)],
 1855: 
 1856:     %% Attributes are keylists, but have no text.
 1857:     {ok, Ts7, End7} = erl_scan:string(String, {1,1}, Options),
 1858:     {ok, Ts8, End8} = scan_tokens(TString, Options, [], {1,1}),
 1859:     {end1, End1} = {end1, End7},
 1860:     {end2, End2} = {end2, End8},
 1861:     Ts8 = Ts7 ++ [lists:last(Ts8)],
 1862:     {cons,true} = {cons,consistent_attributes([Ts1,Ts2,Ts3,Ts7,Ts8])},
 1863: 
 1864:     {Ts1, End1}.
 1865: 
 1866: scan_tokens(String, Options, Rs, Location) ->
 1867:     case erl_scan:tokens([], String, Location, Options) of
 1868:         {done, {ok,Ts,End}, ""} ->
 1869:             {ok, lists:append(lists:reverse([Ts|Rs])), End};
 1870:         {done, {ok,Ts,End}, Rest} ->
 1871:             scan_tokens(Rest, Options, [Ts|Rs], End)
 1872:     end.
 1873: 
 1874: scan_tokens_1({done, {ok,Ts,End}, ""}, "", _Options, Rs, _Location) ->
 1875:     {ok,lists:append(lists:reverse([Ts|Rs])),End};
 1876: scan_tokens_1({done, {ok,Ts,End}, Rest}, Cs, Options, Rs, _Location) ->
 1877:     scan_tokens_1({more,[]}, Rest++Cs, Options, [Ts|Rs], End);
 1878: scan_tokens_1({more, Cont}, [C | Cs], Options, Rs, Loc) ->
 1879:     R = erl_scan:tokens(Cont, [C], Loc, Options),
 1880:     scan_tokens_1(R, Cs, Options, Rs, Loc).
 1881: 
 1882: consistent_attributes([]) ->
 1883:     true;
 1884: consistent_attributes([Ts | TsL]) ->
 1885:     L = [T || T <- Ts, is_integer(element(2, T))],
 1886:     case L of
 1887:         [] ->
 1888:             TagsL = [[Tag || {Tag,_} <- defined(token_info_long(T))] ||
 1889:                         T <- Ts],
 1890:             case lists:usort(TagsL) of
 1891:                 [_] ->
 1892:                     consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1893:                 [] when Ts =:= [] ->
 1894:                     consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1895:                 _ ->
 1896:                     Ts
 1897:             end;
 1898:         Ts ->
 1899:             consistent_attributes(TsL);
 1900:         _ ->
 1901:             Ts
 1902:     end.
 1903: 
 1904: defined(L) ->
 1905:     [{T,V} || {T,V} <- L, V =/= undefined].
 1906: 
 1907: family_list(L) ->
 1908:     sofs:to_external(family(L)).
 1909: 
 1910: family(L) ->
 1911:     sofs:relation_to_family(sofs:relation(L)).
